description:
"Dclock main feature is its great flexibility in how it can draw."
I have not found a way to configure anything or customize the output other than setting an alarm.

The install here works fine, but if you try to do it via command line I get fatal errors as my system does not have
Intrinsic.h

Which is too bad because I prefer to install it via script.
Bagus banget, sungguh canggih
A simple clock with an alarm, takes up only small amount of desktop space. Very basic and simple, just does the job.
summary: Just what I was looking for

description: Hey Folks, the icon for this is a clock which says 10:52. It is not 10:52. That is going to be super annoying as it is placed where I look a lot.

Would be nice to see some configuration options / settings like colors, switch to analog. but as is it's very nice work.
great that it is flexible in size and flexible proportions.
as suggested, the icon should be changed to not show a static "10:52" all the time.. very confusing.
You can set an alarm but that's about it.
summary: It does what it says it will do

description:
kubuntu 20.04
-clocks work and looks not bad, but this is all

-alarm not play sound if alarm screen opened

-alarm play sound in clock mode -> you touch clock that it shot up -> starts display lagging, and clock can't be recognized

-only mouse click swith alarm time on click one number. Need 45 minutes make 9 clicks, one fail no rollback, made 9 clicks again

-mouse scrolling not switch numbers

... thumbs down
it is a good app but why dont I see the date ?
summary: A good app ,but there is no date

description: Only issue i have there are no settings to customize, therefore the ingredients are changed to the metric system which americans normally do not know off the top of their heads and would be nice to be able to add more categories.
summary: Great app idea for Chefs/Bakers but

description: Very nice digital clock
Great works perfectly wish it displayed seconds, haven't found a way to enable it.
summary: only wish for seconds on there

description: Enjoy the ability to make the digital clock any size I want. Wonderfully simple.
There are many config options for this. typing "man dclock" from a terminal shows configuration options
Alarm sound has too much background noise. After the alarm the digits of the clock start moving without control. If you don't need an alarm, then it's a good option.
summary: Clock gets crazy after alarm goes off

description:
After alarm started the display went crazy - the UI started to flicker and jump.
The interface is easy but non-standard, so it would be nice to have an explanation items.
summary: After alarm started the display went crazy

description: Straight forward digital clock. Really miss displaying seconds when showing time
superb app realy amazing
Installed opened used ok
summary: Very practical does what is advertised

description:
It's a great simple clock. Alarm options need to include mp3's

As it turns out I just leave it run all the time and use
sleep 8h && mplayer *.mp3

as my alarm clock

Ich kann gar nichts konfigurieren! 
- kein Menü
- kein Datum (Vorschaubild falsch!)
- linke Maustaste passiert nichts
- rechte Maustaste wechselt auf eine Art Wecker?, Counter?, Stopur? 
- Anzeige "00:00" und man kann Werte setzten. Ist der erreicht, passiert nichts. Muss man ihn aktivieren? 
- Vielleicht ist da mehr, aber: Keine Beschreibung, keine Infos, kein Menü!

Zeigt die Urzeit. Ganz schick auf den ersten Blick. Sonst nichts!

Man muss halt die Anleitung lesen. Dann weiß man auch, wie die Uhr zu bedienen ist. Als Alarmuhr ist sie ganz gut zu gebrauchen. Die Anleitung ist hier zu finden: http://manpages.ubuntu.com/manpages/trusty/man1/dclock.1.html
desde windowsfx tuve que instalarlo por terminal , pero ya quedo. detaca en el escritorio
funcionaba bien una vez en linux ya no sirve
Просто, функционально, удобно, красиво.
После срабатывания будильника(тихий) впадают в транс
Формат только 12-часовой американский
